### Welcome

My teaching centers on biostatistics and data science. I regularly teach or
coordinate [BIOL
300](https://biologyprogram-2023.sites.olt.ubc.ca/files/2019/08/Syllabus_BIOL300_2019.pdf):
Fundamentals of Biostatistics [at
UBC](https://www.zoology.ubc.ca/person/vikram-baliga). Future efforts may relate
to [DSCI 100](https://ubc-dsci.github.io/dsci-100-student/) or courses that
blend biology, statistics, and data science.

Previously, I was a scientist (also at UBC) who used motion capture and virtual
reality to investigate flight control in birds. Because data from studies of
behavior and neuroscience can be extremely noisy, I came to appreciate the
importance of approaching statistical analyses and the communication of their
results with care.
